00044 void purify_measurement_fft_real(void *out, void *in, 
00045                                  void **data) {
00046 
00047   fftw_plan *plan;
00048   int iu, iv, ind, ind_half;
00049   int iu_neg, iv_neg, ind_neg;
00050   double complex *y, *y_half;
00051   purify_image *img;
00052 
00053   // Cast intput pointers.
00054   y = (double complex*)out;
00055   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00056   img = (purify_image*)data[1];
00057 
00058   // Allocate space for output of real-to-complex FFT before compute
00059   // full plane through conjugate symmetry.
00060   y_half = (complex double*)malloc(img->nx*img->ny*sizeof(complex double));
00061   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y_half);
00062 
00063   // Perform real-to-complex FFT.
00064   fftw_execute_dft_r2c(*plan, 
00065                        (double*)in, 
00066                        y_half);
00067 
00068   // Compute other half of complex plane through conjugate symmetry.
00069   for (iu = 0; iu < img->nx; iu++) {
00070     for (iv = 0; iv < img->ny/2+1; iv++) {
00071 
00072       ind_half = iu*(img->ny/2+1) + iv;
00073       purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind, iu, iv, 
00074                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00075 
00076       // Copy current data element.
00077       y[ind] = y_half[ind_half];
00078 
00079       // Compute reflected data through conjugate symmetry if
00080       // necessary.
00081       if (iu == 0 && iv == 0) {
00082         // Do nothing for DC component.
00083       } 
00084       else if (iu == 0) {
00085         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00086         iv_neg = img->ny - iv;
00087         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu, iv_neg, 
00088                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00089         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00090       }
00091       else if (iv == 0) {
00092         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00093         iu_neg = img->nx - iu;
00094         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu_neg, iv, 
00095                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00096         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00097       }
00098       else {
00099         // Reflect along diagonal.
00100         iv_neg = img->ny - iv;
00101         iu_neg = img->nx - iu;
00102         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu_neg, iv_neg, 
00103                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00104         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00105       }
00106     }
00107   }
00108   
00109   // Free temporary memory.
00110   free(y_half);
00111 
00112 }

00127 void purify_measurement_fft_complex(void *out, void *in, 
00128                                     void **data) {
00129 
00130   fftw_plan *plan;
00131 
00132   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00133   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, 
00134                    (complex double*)in, 
00135                    (complex double*)out);
00136 
00137 }

00203 void purify_measurement_opfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data) {
00204 
00205   fftw_plan *plan;
00206   purify_image *img;
00207   purify_sparsemat *mask;
00208 
00209   void *data_fft[2];
00210   void *data_mask[1];  
00211   double complex* vis_full;
00212 
00213   plan = (fftw_plan *)data[0];
00214   img = (purify_image *)data[1];
00215   mask = (purify_sparsemat*)data[2];
00216 
00217   vis_full = malloc(img->nx * img->ny * sizeof(double complex));
00218   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(vis_full);
00219 
00220   data_fft[0] = (void *)plan;
00221   data_fft[1] = (void *)img;
00222   purify_measurement_fft_real((void *)vis_full, in, data_fft);
00223 
00224   data_mask[0] = (void *)mask;
00225   purify_measurement_mask_opfwd(out, (void *)vis_full, data_mask);
00226 
00227   free(vis_full);
00228 
00229 }

00244 void purify_measurement_init_cft(purify_sparsemat_row *mat, 
00245                                  double *deconv, double *u, double *v, 
00246                                  purify_measurement_cparam *param) {
00247 
00248   int i, j, k, l;
00249   int nx2, ny2;
00250   double u1;
00251   double v1;
00252   int g1, g2, h1, h2;
00253   int  g11, h11;
00254   double temp1, temp2, sigmax, sigmay;
00255   int row, st, numel;
00256   
00257   double *u2;
00258   double *v2;
00259   double *u3;
00260   double *v3;
00261 
00262   double *kernel;
00263   int *ptr;
00264   
00265   //Sparse matrix initialization
00266   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00267   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00268 
00269   mat->nrows = param->nmeas;
00270   mat->ncols = nx2*ny2;
00271   mat->nvals = param->kx*param->ky*param->nmeas;
00272   mat->real = 1;
00273   mat->cvals = NULL;
00274   numel = param->kx*param->ky;
00275  
00276   
00277   mat->vals = (double*)malloc(mat->nvals * sizeof(double));
00278   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->vals);
00279   mat->colind = (int*)malloc(mat->nvals * sizeof(int));
00280   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->colind);
00281   mat->rowptr = (int*)malloc((mat->nrows + 1) * sizeof(int));
00282   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->rowptr);
00283 
00284 
00285   //Discrete frequency grids
00286   u2 = (double*)malloc(nx2 * sizeof(double));
00287   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00288   v2 = (double*)malloc(ny2 * sizeof(double));
00289   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2);
00290   u3 = (double*)malloc((nx2 + param->kx) * sizeof(double));
00291   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u3);
00292   v3 = (double*)malloc((ny2 + param->ky) * sizeof(double));
00293   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v3);
00294 
00295   
00296   temp1 = 2*PURIFY_PI/(double)nx2;
00297   u2[0] = 0.0;
00298   for (i=1; i < nx2; i++){
00299     u2[i] = u2[i-1] + temp1;
00300   }
00301   u3[0] = -((double)param->kx/2.0)*temp1;
00302   for (i=1; i < (nx2 + param->kx); i++){
00303     u3[i] = u3[i-1] + temp1;
00304   }
00305 
00306   temp1 = 2*PURIFY_PI/(double)ny2;
00307   v2[0] = 0.0;
00308   for (i=1; i < ny2; i++){
00309     v2[i] = v2[i-1] + temp1;
00310   }
00311   v3[0] = -((double)param->ky/2.0)*temp1;
00312   for (i=1; i < (ny2 + param->ky); i++){
00313     v3[i] = v3[i-1] + temp1;
00314   }
00315 
00316 
00317   //Allocate memory for the kernel
00318   kernel = (double*)malloc((numel) * sizeof(double));
00319   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(kernel);
00320 
00321   ptr = (int*)malloc((numel) * sizeof(int));
00322   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ptr);
00323 
00324 
00325   //Scale parameters for the Gaussian interpolation kernel
00326   sigmax = 1.0/(double)param->nx1;
00327   sigmay = 1.0/(double)param->ny1;
00328 
00329 
00330   //Main loop
00331   for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++){
00332     
00333     //Row pointer
00334     row = i*numel;
00335     
00336     //Shift by 2Pi for negative frecquencies (fftshift)
00337     if (u[i] < 0.0){
00338       u1 = u[i] + 2*PURIFY_PI;
00339     }
00340     else{
00341       u1 = u[i];
00342     }
00343 
00344     if (v[i] < 0.0){
00345       v1 = v[i] + 2*PURIFY_PI;
00346     }
00347     else{
00348       v1 = v[i];
00349     }
00350     
00351     //Find closest point in the discrete grid
00352     g1 = purify_utils_absearch(u2, nx2, u1);
00353     h1 = purify_utils_absearch(v2, ny2, v1);
00354 
00355     
00356     //Pointers in u2 and v2
00357     g2 = g1 + (param->kx/2);
00358     g1 = g1 - (param->kx/2) + 1;
00359     h2 = h1 + (param->ky/2);
00360     h1 = h1 - (param->ky/2) + 1;
00361 
00362  
00363     //Pointers in u3 and v3
00364     g11 = g1 + (param->kx/2);
00365     h11 = h1 + (param->ky/2);
00366 
00367     
00368     //Interpolation kernel evaluated on the discrete grid
00369     for (k=0; k < param->kx; k++){
00370       temp1 = (u3[g11 + k] - u1)/sigmax;
00371       temp1 = temp1*temp1;
00372       st = k*param->ky;
00373       for (j=0; j < param->ky; j++){
00374         temp2 = (v3[h11 + j] - v1)/sigmay;
00375         temp2 = temp2*temp2;
00376         temp2 = -(temp1 + temp2)/2.0;
00377         kernel[j + st] = exp(temp2);
00378       }
00379     }
00380   
00381     //Foldings for the circular shifts
00382     if ((g1 < 0)&&(h1 < 0)){
00383       //Case 1
00384 
00385       h11 = ny2+h1;
00386       j = param->ky - ny2;
00387       // 1 and 2
00388       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00389         st = l*param->ky;
00390         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00391         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00392           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00393           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00394         }
00395         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00396           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00397           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00398         }
00399       }
00400       
00401       // 3 and 4
00402       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00403         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00404         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00405         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00406           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00407           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00408         }
00409         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00410           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00411           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00412         }
00413       }
00414 
00415       //Column pointer vector
00416       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00417         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00418       }
00419 
00420     }  
00421     else if ((g1 < 0)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00422       //Case 2
00423 
00424       //2
00425       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00426         st = l*param->ky;
00427         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00428         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00429           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00430           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00431         }
00432       }
00433       
00434       //1
00435       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00436         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00437         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00438         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00439           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00440           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00441         }
00442       }
00443 
00444       //Column pointer vector
00445       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00446         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00447       }
00448 
00449     } 
00450     else if ((g1 < 0)&&(h2 >= ny2)){
00451       //Case 3
00452 
00453       h11 = ny2-h1;
00454       j = param->ky - ny2;
00455       // 1 and 2
00456       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00457         st = l*param->ky;
00458         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00459         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00460           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00461           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00462         }
00463         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00464           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00465           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00466         }
00467       }
00468       
00469       // 3 and 4
00470       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00471         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00472         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00473         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00474           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00475           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00476         }
00477         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00478           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00479           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00480         }
00481       }
00482 
00483       //Column pointer vector
00484       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00485         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00486       }
00487 
00488     } 
00489     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h1 < 0)){
00490       //Case 4
00491       h11 = ny2+h1;
00492       j = param->ky - ny2;
00493  
00494       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00495         st = (l - g1)*param->ky;
00496         //2
00497         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00498           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00499           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + st];
00500           
00501         }
00502         //1
00503         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00504           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00505           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + st];
00506         }
00507       }
00508 
00509       //Column pointer vector
00510       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00511         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00512       }
00513 
00514     }
00515     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00516       //Case 5
00517 
00518       j = 0;
00519       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00520         st = l*ny2;
00521         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00522           ptr[j] = k + st;
00523           j++;
00524         }
00525       }
00526       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00527         mat->vals[j + row] = kernel[j];
00528         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00529       }
00530 
00531     }
00532     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h2 >= ny2)){
00533       //Case 6
00534 
00535       h11 = ny2-h1;
00536       j = param->ky - ny2;
00537       
00538       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00539         st = (l - g1)*param->ky;
00540         //2
00541         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00542           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00543           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + st];
00544         }
00545         //1
00546         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00547           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00548           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + st];
00549         }
00550       }
00551 
00552       //Column pointer vector
00553       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00554         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00555       }
00556 
00557     }  
00558     else if ((g2 >= nx2)&&(h1 < 0)){
00559       //Case 7
00560 
00561       h11 = ny2+h1;
00562       j = param->ky - ny2;
00563       // 1 and 2
00564       for (l = 0; l <= param->kx-nx2+g1-1; l++){
00565         st = l*param->ky;
00566         g11 = (l+nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00567         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00568           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00569           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00570         }
00571         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00572           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00573           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00574         }
00575       }
00576       
00577       // 3 and 4
00578       for (l = g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00579         st = (l + param->kx - nx2)*param->ky;
00580         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00581         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00582           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00583           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00584         }

00588         }
00589       }
00590 
00591       //Column pointer vector
00592       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00593         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00594       }
00595 
00596     }  
00597     else if ((g2 >= nx2)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00598       //Case 8
00599 
00600       //2
00601       for (l = 0; l <= param->kx-nx2+g1-1; l++){
00602         st = l*param->ky;
00603         g11 = (l+nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00604         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00605           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00606           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00607         }
00608       }
00609 
00610       //1
00611       for (l = g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00612         st = (l + param->kx - nx2)*param->ky;
00613         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00614         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00615           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00616           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00617         }
00618       }
00619

00625     }  
00626     else if ((g2 >= nx2)&&(h2 >= ny2)){
00627       //Case 9
00628 
00629       h11 = ny2-h1;
00630       j = param->ky - ny2;
00631       // 1 and 2
00632       for (l = 0; l <= param->kx-nx2+g1-1; l++){
00633         st = l*param->ky;
00634         g11 = (l+nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00635         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00636           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00637           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00638         }
00639         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00640           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00641           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00642         }
00643       }
00644       
00645       // 3 and 4
00646       for (l = g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00647         st = (l + param->kx - nx2)*param->ky;
00648         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00649         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){

00651           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00652         }

00656         }
00657       }
00658

00660       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00661         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00662       }
00663 
00664     }
00665         
00666   }
00667 
00668   //Row pointer vector
00669   for (j = 0; j < mat->nrows + 1; j++){
00670     mat->rowptr[j] = j*numel;
00671   }
00672 
00673   //Deconvolution kernel in image domain
00674    
00675   u2[0] = -(double)param->nx1/2;
00676   for (i=1; i < param->nx1; i++){
00677     u2[i] = u2[i-1] + 1.0;
00678   }
00679  
00680   v2[0] = -(double)param->ny1/2;
00681   for (i=1; i < param->ny1; i++){
00682     v2[i] = v2[i-1] + 1.0;
00683   }
00684  
00685   for (k=0; k < param->nx1; k++){
00686     temp1 = u3[k]*sigmax;
00687     temp1 = temp1*temp1;
00688     st = k*param->ny1;
00689     for (j=0; j < param->ny1; j++){
00690       temp2 = v3[j]*sigmay;
00691       temp2 = temp2*temp2;
00692       temp2 = -(temp1 + temp2)/2.0;
00693       deconv[j + st] = 1.0/exp(temp2);
00694     }
00695   }
00696 
00697   //Free temporal memory
00698   free(u2);
00699   free(v2);
00700   free(u3);
00701   free(v3);
00702   free(kernel);
00703   free(ptr);
00704 
00705 }
00706 
00728 void purify_measurement_cftfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00729 
00730   int i, j, nx2, ny2;
00731   int st1, st2;
00732   double scale;
00733   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00734   double *deconv;
00735   purify_sparsemat_row *mat;
00736   fftw_plan *plan;
00737   complex double *temp;
00738   complex double *xin;
00739   complex double *yout;
00740   complex double alpha;
00741 
00742   //Cast input pointers
00743   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00744   deconv = (double*)data[1];
00745   mat = (purify_sparsemat_row*)data[2];
00746   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[3];
00747   temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00748 
00749   xin = (complex double*)in;
00750   yout = (complex double*)out;
00751 
00752   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00753   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00754   
00755   alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00756   //Zero padding and decovoluntion. 
00757   //Left top corner of thee image corresponf to the original image.
00758   for (i=0; i < nx2*ny2; i++){
00759     *(temp + i) = alpha;
00760   }
00761 
00762   //Scaling
00763   scale = 1/sqrt((double)(nx2*ny2));
00764 
00765   for (j=0; j < param->nx1; j++){
00766     st1 = j*param->ny1;
00767     st2 = j*ny2;
00768     for (i=0; i < param->ny1; i++){
00769       *(temp + st2 + i) = *(xin + st1 + i)**(deconv + st1 + i)*scale;
00770     }
00771   }
00772 
00773   //FFT
00774   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, temp, temp);
00775 
00776   //Multiplication by the sparse matrix storing the interpolation kernel
00777   purify_sparsemat_fwd_complexr(yout, temp, mat);
00778 
00779 }
00780 
00802 void purify_measurement_cftadj(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00803 
00804   int i, j, nx2, ny2;
00805   int st1, st2;
00806   double scale;
00807   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00808   double *deconv;
00809   purify_sparsemat_row *mat;
00810   fftw_plan *plan;
00811   complex double *temp;
00812   complex double *yin;
00813   complex double *xout;
00814 
00815   //Cast input pointers
00816   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00817   deconv = (double*)data[1];
00818   mat = (purify_sparsemat_row*)data[2];
00819   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[3];
00820   temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00821 
00822   yin = (complex double*)in;
00823   xout = (complex double*)out;
00824 
00825   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00826   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00827 
00828   //Multiplication by the adjoint of the 
00829   //sparse matrix storing the interpolation kernel
00830   purify_sparsemat_adj_complexr(temp, yin, mat);
00831 
00832   //Inverse FFT
00833   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, temp, temp);
00834   //Scaling
00835   scale = 1/sqrt((double)(nx2*ny2));
00836   
00837   //Cropping and decovoluntion. 
00838   //Top left corner of the image corresponf to the original image.
00839 
00840   for (j=0; j < param->nx1; j++){
00841     st1 = j*param->ny1;
00842     st2 = j*ny2;
00843     for (i=0; i < param->ny1; i++){
00844       *(xout + st1 + i) = *(temp + st2 + i)**(deconv + st1 + i)*scale;
00845     }
00846   }
00847 
00848 }
00849 
00862 double purify_measurement_pow_meth(void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00863                                    void **A_data,
00864                                    void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00865                                    void **At_data) {
00866 
00867   int i, iter, nx, ny;
00868   int seedn = 51;
00869   double bound, norm, rel_ob;
00870   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00871   complex double *y;
00872   complex double *x;
00873 
00874   
00875   //Cast input pointers
00876   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)A_data[0];
00877   nx = param->nx1*param->ny1;
00878   ny = param->nmeas;
00879   iter = 0;
00880 
00881   y = (complex double*)malloc((ny) * sizeof( complex double));
00882   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);
00883   x = (complex double*)malloc((nx) * sizeof( complex double));
00884   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x);
00885 
00886   if (param->nmeas > nx){
00887     for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00888         x[i] = purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I;
00889     }
00890     norm = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)x, 1);
00891     for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00892         x[i] = x[i]/norm;
00893     }
00894     norm = 1.0;
00895 
00896     //main loop
00897     while (iter < 200){
00898       A((void*)y, (void*)x, A_data);
00899       At((void*)x, (void*)y, At_data);
00900       bound = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)x, 1);
00901       rel_ob = (bound - norm)/norm;
00902       if (rel_ob <= 0.001)
00903         break;
00904       norm = bound;
00905       for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00906           x[i] = x[i]/norm;
00907       }
00908       iter++;
00909     }
00910 
00911   }
00912   else{
00913     for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00914         y[i] = purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I;
00915     }
00916     norm = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)y, 1);
00917     for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00918         y[i] = y[i]/norm;
00919     }
00920     norm = 1.0;
00921 
00922     //main loop
00923     while (iter < 200){
00924       At((void*)x, (void*)y, At_data);
00925       A((void*)y, (void*)x, A_data);
00926       bound = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)y, 1);
00927       rel_ob = (bound - norm)/norm;
00928       if (rel_ob <= 0.001)
00929         break;
00930       norm = bound;
00931       for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00932           y[i] = y[i]/norm;
00933       }
00934       iter++;
00935     }
00936 
00937   }
00938 
00939   free(y);
00940   free(x);
00941 
00942   return bound;
00943 
00944 }
00945 
00969 void purify_measurement_symcftfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00970 
00971   int i, ny;
00972   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00973   complex double *yout;
00974 
00975   purify_measurement_cftfwd(out, in, data);
00976 
00977   //Cast input pointers
00978   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00979   yout = (complex double*)out;
00980   ny = param->nmeas;
00981  
00982    
00983   //Take real part and multiply by two.
00984 
00985   for (i=0; i < ny; i++){
00986     yout[i + ny] = conj(yout[i]);
00987     
00988   }
00989 
00990 }
00991 
01015 void purify_measurement_symcftadj(void *out, void *in, void **data){
01016 
01017   int i, nx;
01018   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
01019   complex double *xout;
01020 
01021   purify_measurement_cftadj(out, in, data);
01022 
01023   //Cast input pointers
01024   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
01025   xout = (complex double*)out;
01026   nx = param->nx1*param->ny1;
01027  
01028    
01029   //Take real part and multiply by two.
01030 
01031   for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
01032     xout[i] = 2*creal(xout[i]) + 0.0*I;
01033     
01034   }
01035 
01036 }
